nodes.text: The Secrets of Jedi Power was a document that could be purchased from The Galactic Archives in Atzerri's Trader's Plaza. It was recently added to the store's catalog around the Black Fleet Crisis and was considered a bestseller. It claimed to answer all the questions about the galaxy's mystical practitioners. To access the document, an interested purchaser would have blue tabs attached to their credit tab and would need to travel to their central archives location some distance away. Then the purchaser would be faced with either a high price for the document, around two thousand credits, or haggle down to something more reasonable, pending they brought along a friend the next time.
When a curious Luke Skywalker attempted to access this document, he was able to haggle the price down to nine hundred credits for the file and a datapad.
